alert.note: Alert for Jasper (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 4:05PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Jasper County through 445 PM CDT... At 405 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Turnerville, or 14 miles south of Newton, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Turnerville around 425 PM CDT. Bay Springs around 430 PM CDT. Paulding around 435 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Montrose and Louin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
